text: Guioa parvifoliola is a species of plant in the family Sapindaceae. It is endemic to the Philippines, on Ilocos Norte. ==References== parvifoliola Category:Endemic flora of the Philippines Category:Critically endangered flora of Asia Category:Flora of Luzon Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot Category:Taxa named by Elmer Drew Merrill
title: Guioa parvifoliola
